routine.name: Create_root_node
routine.description: Creates new root node of given scene type

param.name: Type
param.description: Type of scene. Supported types can be queried with Enumerate_types

routine.name: Get_supported_types_number
routine.description: Returns number of supported scene types. See Enumerate_types

routine.name: Enumerate_types
routine.description: Returns name of scene type at given index
